pageTitle: Samsung Galaxy Note 3 N9000 Best Price in India 2015, Specifications & Review
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8937=The global leading smartphone brand for more than a year, Samsung has showed up again with the new Samsung Galaxy Note 3 flagship smartphone, the successor to Galaxy Note 2. Samsung Galaxy Note 3 best price in India is approximately INR 29,000. Following are the detailed Samsung Galaxy Note 3 specifications and review. Design and hardware Samsung Galaxy Note 3 carries the traditional design with metal finish along the edges. The device has a leather finish rear panel which is resistant to finger marks and feels better to hold. Note 3 specifications highlight a quad-core Cortex A7 processor with a clock speed of 1.9 GHz and 3 GB ram. It has an inbuilt memory of 32 GB and supports microSD card up to 64 GB. Samsung Galaxy Note 3 battery is a 3200 mAh Li-ion setup. Operating System and Software Features Samsung Galaxy Note 3 runs on Android v4.3 JellyBean platform, which upgradeable to the latest Android Lollipop v5.0 version. This device appears to be a real trendsetter by Samsung in the smartphone segment. The phone includes Bluetooth v4.0, Wi-Fi, supports HDMI, NFC and features A-GPS with GLONAS. Camera and Display Samsung Galaxy Note 3 sports a 13 MP autofocus primary camera with face-detection, geo tagging, smile detection and a LED flash by its side. Daylight pictures are crisp to the very finest delicacies of the photograph due to the high resolution. The13 MP camera is capable of 1800p HD video at 60fps which gives it a head start in the race. The 2 MP front camera is a decent call for selfies and video calling in daylight. The 5.7 inch SUPER AMOLED display is an HD display with a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels and a multipoint capacitive touchscreen. The display is a pro and provides excellent visibility in daylight. Overview To conclude the Samsung Galaxy Note 3 review, Samsung Galaxy Note 3 is an excellent device for phablet lovers. For those who prefer a 5 inch plus screen size, this is just one of the best options. You can buy Samsung Galaxy Note 3 online from various e-commerce websites like Flipkart, Snapdeal, etc. for a price of around at INR 29,000 in India. It’s a complete package with excellence running through each nerve. For detailed price comparison, you can hit the e-commerce market.}
